scripts.db:setup: echo 'Please run the SQL in database_schema_fixed.sql in your Supabase SQL editor'
scripts.db:reset: echo 'To reset database, drop all tables and re-run database_schema_fixed.sql'
scripts.check:env: node -e "console.log('Supabase URL:', process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_URL ? 'Set' : 'Not Set'); console.log('Supabase Key:', process.env.REACT_APP_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY ? 'Set' : 'Not Set');"
scripts.verify:setup: echo 'Run npm run check:env and verify your .env.local file exists'
scripts.deploy:prepare: npm run check:env && npm run build
